forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow before 2am, then rain and snow likely between 2am and 5am, then a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy. Low around 34, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. Wind chill values as low as 25. South southeast wind 14 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely before 7am, then rain and snow likely between 7am and 8am, then rain and snow between 8am and 5pm, then rain and snow. Cloudy, with a high near 39. Wind chill values as low as 24. South southeast wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
